name: Flip Color - Make Them Fit
description:
Is simple, addictive, funny puzzle game made by Best Games World
Do you enjoy the puzzle games? Do you like lovely colors?

Features
Easy to play, drag & drop to make hexagonal puzzles.
Designed for all ages, have fun with your families.
Thousands of levels with challenges.

How To Play ?

Drag the triangles to the boards.
Combine triangles into hexagon with same color.
Get enough hexagons to complete the mission requirements.

Flip Color, Why not ? Lets try now!
And see how long, how far, how scores you can GET and you can GO !
